data.message: Force-directed graphs (react-force-graph-2d) are the natural fit for visualizing topic connections data. Key implementation: canvas-based for performance, physics simulation (node repulsion + link springs) creates organic layouts, click-to-expand interaction model matches API that fetches connections per-topic. Visual refinements: remove emojis for cohesive style, scale text proportionally with zoom (map-like behavior), increase node spacing via force parameters.
